description: Kara Tointon showed off her glowing complexion when she went make-up free to Alice's Adventures Underground press night in London on Tuesday.
title: Kara Tointon reunites with Mr Selfridge's Katherine Kelly
title_page: Kara Tointon reunites with Mr Selfridge's Katherine Kelly | Daily Mail Online
text:
Kara Tointon showed off her glowing complexion when she went make-up free to Alice's Adventures Underground press night in London on Tuesday.
The 33-year-old former EastEnders actress looked stunning when she ditched her usual red carpet lipstick and eyeliner for the glitzy event.
She styled a striking floor length black gown, which showcased her petite frame.
Scroll down for video
Kara Tointon showed off her glowing complexion when she went make-up free to Alice's Adventures Underground press night in London on Tuesday
Sweeping her brunette locks into a messy bun, she put the focus on her make-up free features.
The soap queen dressed down her ensemble with a biker leather jacket, which was edged with white fur.
She accessorised with a small black bag and a retro watch, which didn't detract away from her simple attire.
Before and after: The 33-year-old former EastEnders actress looked stunning when she ditched her usual red carpet lipstick and eyeliner for the glitzy event
Different look: The soap queen dressed down her ensemble with a biker leather jacket, which was edged with white fur
Kara joined Mr. Selfridge co-star Katherine Kelly, 37, at the event who pulled off a biker chick look with a chic leather jacket.
She completed her casual ensemble with a pair of loose trousers and a pair of trainers.
The former Coronation Street star added a splash of colour to her outfit with a flash of scarlet lipstick.
Her bold make-up brought attention to the vibrant colours in her floral scarf, which was made up primarily of emerald green and fiery red flowers.
Chic! Kara joined Mr Selfridge co-star Katherine Kelly, 37, at the event who pulled off a biker look with a leather jacket
Add a splash of colour! The former Coronation Street star wore a brush of scarlet lipstick, which brought attention to the vibrant colours in her scarf
Perfect finish: The former Coronation Street actress completed her casual ensemble with a pair of loose trousers and a pair of trainers
On trend as ever, the duo were closely followed by 2008 X Factor semi finalist Diana Vickers.
The 25-year-old also wore a chic leather jacket, teamed with skintight leggings which showed off her slender pins.
She pulled off a tousled look when she let her golden locks fall in a natural array around her face.
Beauty! 2008 X Factor semi finalist Diana Vickers also wore a chic leather jacket, teamed with skintight leggings which showed off her slender pins
The TV personalities enjoyed each other's charming company as they celebrated the press night of the West End show.
Alice's Adventures Underground has returned to London after a successful sell-out run in 2015.
The Olivier nominated performance takes theatre-goers to the Mad Hatters' tea party and puts you up against the fearsome Queen of Hearts.
